justification: Good ToM in spotting B’s TE hole and offering a TE1 with friendly playoffs plus a rookie WR that fits B’s preferences. It distinguishes A’s RB need from B’s incentives. But it overlooks that B also values rookie breakout RBs like David Adams and would be thin at RB (Week 11 byes). Calling Adams “surplus” is unsubstantiated. Trade is feasible but value is skewed (A overpays), so B’s accept probability likely exceeds 0.56. Rationale is clear but shallow.
